statements: INSERT INTO crop_growth_stages (stage_id, stage_name, growth_description, optimal_conditions) VALUES (1, 'Germination', 'Seeds sprout and seedlings start to form.', 'Moist soil and moderate sunlight.');

INSERT INTO crop_growth_stages (stage_id, stage_name, growth_description, optimal_conditions) VALUES (2, 'Vegetative Growth', 'Plants focus on leaf and stem development.', 'Regular watering and nutrient-rich soil.');

INSERT INTO crop_growth_stages (stage_id, stage_name, growth_description, optimal_conditions) VALUES (3, 'Flowering', 'Plants produce flowers for reproduction.', 'Plenty of sunlight and appropriate temperature.');

INSERT INTO crop_growth_stages (stage_id, stage_name, growth_description, optimal_conditions) VALUES (4, 'Fruiting', 'Plants bear fruits for seed dispersal.', 'Consistent watering and adequate pollination.');

INSERT INTO crop_growth_stages (stage_id, stage_name, growth_description, optimal_conditions) VALUES (5, 'Harvest', 'Time to collect mature crops for consumption.', 'Dry weather conditions and ripe produce ready to be picked.');
